citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The frames around the entry doors between the indoor and outdoor enclosures for the lemurs are accumulating a build up
of a grimy substance. Build ups of debris and waste material increases the risk of disease hazard. All surfaces in the
primary enclosures shall be cleaned and sanitized every 2 weeks or as necessary to prevent an excessive accumulation
of dirt, debris.
Correct by December 23, 2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.84(b)(2) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The frames around the entry doors between the indoor and outdoor enclosures for the lemurs are accumulating a build up 
of a grimy substance.  Build ups of debris and waste material increases the risk of disease hazard. All surfaces in the 
primary enclosures shall be cleaned and sanitized every 2 weeks or as necessary to prevent an excessive accumulation 
of dirt, debris. 
 
Correct by December 23, 2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee. 
 
End Section
